title: Gorgonzola bruschetta with balsamic figs
ingredients: ['2 figs, quartered', '1 tablespoon brown sugar', '2 tablespoons Modena balsamic vinegar, plus extra to serve', '4 slices ciabatta bread', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, plus extra to serve', '1/2 garlic clove', '2 small handfuls watercress', '2 tablespoons fresh mint leaves', 'cracked black pepper', '50g Gorgonzola piccante cheese']
